page.title: 02LIFE STYLES IN SHELFORD
page.content:
The people of Shelford have lots of different lifestyles.Here are all the different things they do.The commuters,who will live in shelford and go to work in Nottingham or Birmingham. They leave at seven or eight o'clock and return late at night. They could have chosen Shelford because they can come back home to a nice peaceful time in the evening free of all the hustle and bustle of the city.
Next the country folk who like the lifestyle in shelford a lot.Their tractors will rumble around in the fields which are spread all around the edge of Shelford which is set out in a big valley low down.They will own a farm and grow some of their food or produce. The big barns are used for
